***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
म- (ma-, negative prefix) +‎ पर्- (par-, “be able; become well”) +‎ -उ (-u)
(nominaliser/relativiser).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [məpəu]
**** Adjective[edit] ****
मपउ • (mapau) (Newa Spelling 𑐩𑐥𑐄)
   1. (Dolakha) sick, ill
            जि वा मपउ मि रा?
                  ji wā mapau mi rā?
                  I was a sick person?
